NAME wall

DLG SPR_0
I'm an invisible cat.

DLG ITM_0
"""
*{shk}chomp{shk}*{br}{clr3}"ouchouchOUCH{shk}OUCHOU{wvy}CHOUCHOOOUU--{wvy}{shk}{clr3}{br}
(js "startNarrating('you ate '+numFruit+' fruit{br}then became an ouroboros', true)")
"""
DLG ITM_2
"""
*{shk}chomp{shk}*{br}{clr3}"ouchouchOUCH{shk}OUCHOU{wvy}CHOUCHOOOUU--{wvy}{shk}{clr3}{br}
(js "startNarrating('you ate '+numFruit+' fruit{br}then broke your jaw on stone', true)")
"""

DLG ITM_1
"""
(js "placeFruit()"){rbw}*{wvy}nom{wvy}*{rbw}
"""

VAR a
42
